name: Rebirth of Kelpies
description:
A game by Asfrang and Palibex

Rebirth of Kelpies is a narrative game with point-and-click and visual novels mechanics, taking place is Scotland, around the folkloric legend of Kelpie. You'll have to discover different characters, places, and take notes about your environnement to figure out how to revive this legend. But keep an eye on the legend in fluence, you have to be quick.

You can chill playing it with some tea and curiosity. :) 

Good luck my child.
